name: Marcin Karol Kotlinski
profile_summary:
As a Senior Full Stack Engineer with 8 years of experience, I excel in full-stack development leveraging **Python**, **Django**, **FastAPI**, **TypeScript**, **React**, and **PostgreSQL**. My expertise also includes proficiency in cloud operations utilizing **Kubernetes**, **Helm**, and monitoring with **Datadog**. I have successfully led teams in creating high-performance, enterprise-grade solutions in the healthcare and financial sectors, integrating AI capabilities for enhanced predictive analytics and intelligent automation.
I possess strong technical leadership skills with a focus on code review and knowledge sharing, ensuring best practices and compliance standards such as HIPAA, FHIR, PCI DSS, and SOC 2 are met. Additionally, I have hands-on experience in microservices architecture and event-driven systems, complemented by expertise in implementing CI/CD automation processes. Fluent in English and capable of professional communication in German, I am committed to continuous learning and innovation in technology.

Employed **TypeScript** and front-end frameworks such as **React (17-18)** and **Material UI** to create responsive user interfaces that enhance user experience across various platforms.
Managed databases effectively with **PostgreSQL**, optimizing for performance and scalability while facilitating large data sets for healthcare applications.
Led team integration of **Kubernetes** for orchestrating containerized applications, contributing to deployment strategies with **Helm** and improving application reliability and scalability.

Integrated AI functionalities into applications, harnessing machine learning frameworks to deliver smart dashboards and predictive analytics for end users.
Communicated effectively in both **English** and **German**, ensuring clear collaboration across diverse teams and stakeholders.
Collaborated with DevOps teams to enhance cloud operations, leveraging best practices in **Cloud Ops** methodologies to improve operational efficiency.
Delivered impactful project outcomes through mentoring junior developers and establishing sustainable testing strategies using frameworks relevant to the tech stack.

Partook in technical discussions for feature planning, estimation, and architecture designs, aiding in defining project scope and timelines for over **15 successful projects** in the last fiscal year.
